name: Maddie: 2
description:
Well, here we go again!

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Walk
  • Mouse to turn around
  • Left-click or E - Pickup/Interact
  • Space or TAB - Look Behind
  • Escape or P - Pause Game

Check out the first game here!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Inspired by Baldi's Basics.

If you don't know what to do on the DOS screen, just type "MADDIE.EXE".

Story:

Uh oh! Not again! Your friend has forgotten his poem scraps in school again, and this time it's 12 poem scraps! Once you get there, you realize that the school now flies in the clouds, and you have to use an airplane to get there! The school is much more bigger, and has a new teacher!

This was inspired by DOS games, e.g. Sonic's Schoolhouse and the gameplay was inspired by Baldi's Basics.

This game fits the theme by being completely random. It depends what will happen. One minute later you will get hallucination, the next minute there will maybe a fire, or flood, or maybe the bell rings and a student stampede appears, etc.
